Detailed Description

Activity

include "litesql.hpp"

Activity Class is automatically generated by litesql from the xml file: pomotuxdatabase.xml. It is the abstraction of all possible activities containing all the relevant information necessary to apply the Pomodoro technique

See also:
pomotuxdatabase.hpp

Member Function Documentation

void pomotuxdatabase::Activity::Delete ( const litesql::Database &  rDatabase,
Activity &  rCurrentActivity,
ActivityInventorySheet &  rAIS,
TodoTodaySheet &  rTTS 
) [virtual]

Deletes completly an Activity removing it from the database (i.e. unlinked in the Activity Inveontry Sheet and the Todo Today Sheet relations and deleted from the Activity table)

Parameters:
rDatabase a reference to the litesql::Database in use
delActivity a reference to the Activity that needs to be deleted
rAIS a reference to the Activity Inventory Sheet containig the Activity and from which the Activity is expected to be deleted
rTTS a reference to the Todo Today Sheet from which the activity is expected to be deleted

virtual void pomotuxdatabase::Activity::Modify ( const litesql::Database &  rDatabase,
Activity &  rCurrentActivity,
int  newDeadline,
std::string  newDescription 
) [virtual]

Modifies attributes of the given Activity

Parameters:
rCurrentActivity a reference to the current Activity
newDeadline a date expressed as an Integer representing the new Activity deadline
newDescription a string representing the new description of the Activity
